ygData.subject: RE: Hot Keys
ygData.msgSnippet: From my 20 levels of playing experience here is what I have to offer... You Can t. Zerlargal ... From: Jon Fiedler [mailto:fiedler@travroute.com] Sent: Friday,
ygData.messageBody:
From my 20 levels of playing experience here is
what I have to offer...

You Can't.

Zerlargal

-----Original Message-----
From: Jon Fiedler [mailto:fiedler@...]
Sent: Friday, 6 August 1999 11:06 pm
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Hot Keys


From: "Jon Fiedler" <fiedler@...>

OK, I have a question...

How do you make a hot key to say something like:

it's time to die <insert target name here>

I know how to make normal sayings (without the target name in it) but how do
I make this one?

Thank you,
Jon
